channel.title: VPS Java problem
channel.description:
Hey guys I just got my VPS so I installed java on it and downloaded my source to the VPS but when I try to compile it says "Java is not recognized as internal command...blahblahblah"
I also changed the directory of the compiler to the version of java I have so its not that.
Does anyone know where I went wrong?
